io.mega.megablelib

类 MegaBleCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mega.megablelib.MegaBleCallback

  • public abstract class MegaBleCallback
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by mega on 2018/2/27.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onBatteryChanged(int value, int status)
      请使用MegaBleBattery来辅助判断电池状态，充电中可以收数据，但不能做监测相关动作 请随时响应电池状态改变 normal(0, "normal"), charging(1, "charging"), full(2, "full"), lowPower(3, "lowPower");
      void onConnectionStateChange(boolean connected, MegaBleDevice device)

      • onKnockDevice

        public void onKnockDevice()
        Please shake device for bind. 收到提醒用户摇晃设备，来确认允许用户绑定设备；已绑定时不触发

      • onEnsureBindWhenTokenNotMatch

        public void onEnsureBindWhenTokenNotMatch()
        Bound information changed, please ensure continue bind?

      • onTokenReceived

        public void onTokenReceived(java.lang.String token)
        Receive a pair token, save it. 摇晃设备后，token在此回调中返回，以便下次调用startWithToken，需要用户自己保存。已绑定时不触发
        参数:
        token -

      • onRssiReceived

        public void onRssiReceived(int rssi)
        Rssi value received 每隔5秒返回设备rssi值

      • onDeviceInfoReceived

        public void onDeviceInfoReceived(MegaBleDevice device)
        返回完整的设备信息
        参数:
        device -

      • onReadSn

        public void onReadSn(byte[] a)

      • onBatteryChanged

        public void onBatteryChanged(int value,
                             int status)
        请使用MegaBleBattery来辅助判断电池状态，充电中可以收数据，但不能做监测相关动作 请随时响应电池状态改变 normal(0, "normal"), charging(1, "charging"), full(2, "full"), lowPower(3, "lowPower");

      • onReadyToDfu

        public void onReadyToDfu()
        ready for dfu

      • onSyncingDataProgress

      • onSyncMonitorDataComplete

        public void onSyncMonitorDataComplete(byte[] bytes,
                                      int dataStopType,
                                      int dataType,
                                      java.lang.String uid)
        参数:
        bytes - monitoring data saved by device.
        dataStopType -
        dataType - dataType: spo2: MegaBleConst.MODE_MONITOR; sport: MegaBleConst.MODE_SPORT
